1.0.name: wordpress/stop-pl118-ribbon
1.0.description: A black ribbon with the words "Não à taxa" will be shown on the top right corner of your website, linking to the official petition page of the protest movement. Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon appears. See also the Jonasnuts blog (in portuguese) for more information and background. Thank you for showing your support!
